targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'15m') as time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN 1
   END) as value,
  CASE WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN "Completed"
  WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN "Abandoned"
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN "Unmanaged" END as metric
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
GROUP BY time,metric
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'15m') ASC

panels.content:
# Queue Call Results

1. Answered: the call is answered by an agent

2. Abandoned: the caller hangs up while he is waiting for a free agent

3. Unmanaged: the call is defined unmanaged when it doesn't enter to the queue or when it exits form a queue according to the queue settings (e.g. timeout, leave empty, join empy, exitwithkey, etc..)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  createdAt AS "time",
  id
FROM analytics_custom_reports
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(createdAt)
ORDER BY createdAt

panels.title: Information

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	queue AS 'metric', 
	COUNT(queue) AS value 
FROM 
	report_queue 
WHERE 
	TYPE='inbound' 
	AND queuecallercomplete=1
	and $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
GROUP BY 
	metric
ORDER BY
	metric asc;

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	queue AS 'metric', 
	COUNT(queue) AS value 
FROM 
	report_queue 
WHERE 
	TYPE='inbound' 
	AND queuecallerabandon=1
	and $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
GROUP BY 
	metric
ORDER BY
	metric asc;

SELECT 
  now() as 'time_sec',
	queue AS 'metric', 
	COUNT(queue) AS value 
FROM 
	report_queue 
WHERE 
	TYPE='inbound' 
	AND queuecallerexit=1
	and $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
GROUP BY 
	metric
ORDER BY
	metric asc;

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallercomplete=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallerabandon=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallerexit=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)  and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  SUM(CASE WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN 1
   END) as value,
   
  CASE WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN "Attended"
  WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN "Abandoned"
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN "Unmanaged" END as metric
FROM 
	report_queue
WHERE 
  TYPE='inbound'
	and $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
GROUP BY metric

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallercompleteAt,queuecallerleaveAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallercomplete=1 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallerleaveAt,queuecallerjoinAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallercomplete=1 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) AND queuecallercomplete=1 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallerabandonAt,queuecallerjoinAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallerabandon=1 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) AND queuecallercomplete=0 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallercomplete=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and type='inbound' and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallerabandon=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and type='inbound' and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  SUM(IF(queuecallerexit=1,1,0))/COUNT(*)*100 as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)  and type='inbound' and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
  SUM(CASE WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN 1
  WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN 1
   END) as value,
   
  CASE WHEN queuecallercomplete=1 THEN "Attended"
  WHEN queuecallerabandon=1 THEN "Abandoned"
  WHEN queuecallerexit=1 THEN "Unmanaged" END as metric
FROM 
	report_queue
WHERE 
  TYPE='inbound'
	and $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt)
	and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY metric

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallercompleteAt,queuecallerleaveAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallercomplete=1 and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallerleaveAt,queuecallerjoinAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallercomplete=1 and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) AND queuecallercomplete=1 and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,
  FLOOR(AVG(TIMEDIFF(queuecallerabandonAt,queuecallerjoinAt))) as value
FROM motion2.report_queue
WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) and queuecallerabandon=1 and queue='$queue'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') ASC

  $__timeGroup(queuecallerjoinAt,'5m') as time,

WHERE $__timeFilter(queuecallerjoinAt) AND queuecallercomplete=0 and queue='$queue'
